entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates code that doesn't compile when using StringValues #94547
  • [API Proposal]: Expose the remaining const values in TimeSpan #94545
  • ConfigurationBinder emits AOT warnings even when using Source Generator when passing result into a method #94544
  • Reflection fails when working with struct implementing interface that implements inherited static abstract members #94543
  • Failures building from v6.0.x tags #94541
  • [8.0] Failure in Wasi.Build.Tests.WasiTemplateTests.ConsoleBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #94537
    8.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Add `BindingFlags.PublicOrNonPublic` #94536
    9.0.0
  • UInt64.CreateSaturating<Int128> truncates instead of saturates #94523
    9.0.0
  • List of Redundant conditional #94522
  • Properly test the domain of values in `VARIANT` scenarios #94521
    9.0.0
  • Is there a way to modify the file properties of the exe generated after .NET compilation? #94519
  • APIs that return tokens should be marked RequiresUnreferencedCode #94514
  • Can't import Component Model functions in WASI apps #94513
  • System.Version constructor throws exception with confusing message #94511
  • [HTTP/3] SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3.LargeSingleHeader_ThrowsException QUIC connection timeout #94507
  • RS sync notification flare arm64 #94502
    Future
  • Docs and XML comments for Min/MaxMagnitude are incorrect #94500
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_Create_Invalid #94498

Closed

  • NET 6.0 - mutual TLS with private key stored in TPM2 #94493
  • options.GetConverter used inside other JsonConverter causes "Deserialization of types without[...]" error #94538
  • [8.0] System.Net.Quic.QuicException : The connection timed out from inactivity. #94539
    8.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Consider moving `Monitor.DebugBlockingScope` to be under `Lock` #94242
    9.0.0
  • CultureInfo.Parent under LC_ALL=C does not refer to itself #94505
    Future
  • Mistake in isProxyAuth condition in the InnerSendAsync #94504
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Timer` timeout #91545
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskPropertiesTests.TaskOptionsTestAsync` fails #91549
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskContinueWhenAllTests` fails #91548
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `Http.Tests` fails with `Operation is not supported on this platform` #91673
    9.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] The System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests TransformManyBlockTests.TestProducerConsumerAsyncEnumerable fails on Browser when multi-threading is enabled #75389
    9.0.0
  • Will #88851 be backported to .NET Core 6 or 7? #92239
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure that a native code version only ever gets one entry point that doesn't change #94542
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] catch the case of updated methods in mono_debug_lookup_source_location #94540
    area-EnC-mono
  • JIT: Print finally clone stats with JitTimeLogCsv #94533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: remove `BBF_DONT_REMOVE` from some blocks that can be removed #94532
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix test returning 100 unconditionally #94531
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • improve debuging HTTP/2 tests #94530
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/SVE: Add Uzp1 #94529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Combine rootDir with relative file names #94528
    NO-MERGE, breaking-change, area-Extensions-FileSystem, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that `JsonSerializerOptions.CacheContext` is a singleton. #94527
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] mono only on deputy testing #94525
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] Enable `TestCancelAsync` #94517
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Implement frozen object heap #94515
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add branch label offset to disasm #94512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merge ServicePoint assembly into Requests #94510
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #94506
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix literal formatting in source generators #94070
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.1
  • Add "no R2R" runs. #94509
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Update to servicing branding #94526
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix conditions in targetingpacks.targets #94524
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64: Update certain encodings of instructions to make them size agnostic #94104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update branding to 8.0.1 #94484
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add `-repeatCount` in superpmi.exe to repeat method compilation #94503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: SVE/SVE2 encodings #94285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94469
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.2
  • [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94437
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [browser][mt] Enable `TestProducerConsumerAsyncEnumerable` #94508
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Fix typos in XML comments on XxHash128 #94495
    area-System.IO
  • Fixed interpreter for x64 #94501
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #94408
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android

Updated

  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • JIT: cross-block local assertion prop in morph #94363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge remaining JIT tests #94444
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: stop computing dom start nodes for morph RPO #94497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Comvariant Failure on s390x #94453
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Merge return true/false blocks #94387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.1
  • LSRA: Honor the register aversion decision during allocation #92709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Implement SOS related Debugger API code. #94454
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][MT] more testing and cleanup #94466
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid generating code for unsupported types in config source gen #94438
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add printing full type name of nested types for ilverify output #94441
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • LSRA: PreferCalleeSave for non-localVar intervals #92744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • ElapsedEventArgs: public constructor + sealed #94489
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • HashSet.UnionWith preformance improvement #92300
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Add more gcdump and gcinfo code. #94219
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] sidecar testing #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Complex Rune enumeration over spans of UTF-16 and UTF-8 text #87927
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • update Alpine test images #94487
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
